column2: Lead the coordination efforts between our acquisition and revenue optimization teams worldwide.        Drive the execution of our Direct Supply strategies while enhancing workflow efficiency and prioritization management.      Collate and convey the strategies, directives, and priorities of the Direct Supply Strategy to all relevant stakeholders with clarity and precision.      Implement and monitor adherence to the directives and strategies, ensuring alignment within the team.      Develop and maintain administrative documentation, including role books, key performance indicators (KPIs), and bonus structures.      Drive and coordinate meetings, ensuring proper attendance and swift implementation of resulting actions.      Identify workflow improvement opportunities and lead collaborative efforts to implement solutions.      Act as the point of contact for escalations and inquiries related to strategy implementation.      Provide regular updates and reports on project status, initiatives, and team performance to the ETG organization.                 Key Qualifications               Demonstrated experience in coordination or administrative roles, preferably in a global setting or within the online travel sector;        Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal, capable of effectively conveying complex information to diverse audiences;      Strong organizational abilities with a keen eye for detail, adept at managing multiple tasks and priorities concurrently;      Ability to thrive independently with minimal supervision while excelling in a team-oriented environment;      Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite and familiarity with project management tools is desirable;      International mindset. Ability to understand and work across a wide range of cultural contexts reflecting ETGs global presence;      Language knowledge. Fluent in English, other languages as a plus;      Knowledge of the travel industry as a plus.              We Offer You             Career growth opportunities and a corporate culture that encourages professional development;       Complex and innovative product;     An ambitious team of professionals;     Learning: seminars, trainings and conferences. If you want to participate in a conference, we will help to organize it;     Remote work format;     Corporate discounts on hotels and other services.
column11: Customer Operations

column2: Project Management: In a project management context, a Master Job Controller might be responsible for overseeing the entire project portfolio within an organization     This includes planning, scheduling, and coordinating various projects, ensuring that they align with the organization's strategic goals     Operational Control: In an operations or logistics context, a Master Job Controller could be responsible for coordinating and optimizing the flow of tasks and jobs within an organization     This might involve managing resources, monitoring job progress, and ensuring that operations run efficiently     Data Center Operations: In the context of data center or IT operations, a Master Job Controller could refer to a role responsible for managing and monitoring job scheduling and batch processing, ensuring that data center operations run smoothly     Manufacturing and Production: In manufacturing, a Master Job Controller may oversee job scheduling and production planning to optimize the use of resources and ensure timely delivery of products     Quality Control: In quality control, a Master Job Controller could be responsible for monitoring and controlling various jobs or tasks related to quality assurance and quality control processes within an organization     Administrative Role: In some organizations, the term "Master Job Controller" might be used to describe a senior administrative role that involves coordinating various tasks, assignments, and schedules to ensure smooth operations
column11: Shop floor management

column2: 1. FE has handle the two portfolio Monthly Allocation as well as daily allocation and Minimum 15 customers visits to be done per day   2. For MA Cases - FE needs to visit as per the plan shared by Backend team (in MUCH application).   3. For DA Cases- FE need to visit according to time slot and All visit Feedback has to be updated (in MUCH application).    4. FE has to update details remarks in the visit log (in MUCH application).    5. FE has to upload House Photos of the visited cases (on MUCH).   6. FE Should ensure 50% minimum conversion on DA allocation on daily basis and for MA allocation, minimum 47% resolution should be achieved and as per the business requirement target can increase or decrease.   7. FE Should follow the E- receipt process. If any manual receipts are issued, those need to be submitted with-in 7 days to their respective supervisor.    8. FE has to deposit daily for the previous days collection by 12 PM next day and should share screenshots of the deposit slip to his respective supervisors.    9. He has to follow company process in terms of customer handling etiquettes and dress code while he is on field along with maintaining the Code of conducts and integrity as per company norms.   10. Manual receipt books ops copy to be submit to quality team within 7 days of issuance to customer.
column11: Supervisor, Backend, Customer handling, Manual, Field Executive

column2: Automotive Manufacturers Pvt. Ltd. is looking for Warranty Executive to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey      Warranty Claim Processing:Receive and review warranty claims submitted by customers, dealers, or service centers      Evaluate claims based on established criteria and company policies      Determine the validity of claims and approve or deny accordingly      Customer Communication:Communicate with customers regarding the status of their warranty claims      Provide information on warranty coverage, terms, and conditions      Address customer inquiries and concerns related to warranties      Documentation and Record Keeping:Maintain accurate and detailed records of all warranty claims and resolutions      Prepare reports on warranty performance and share insights with relevant stakeholders      Ensure compliance with record-keeping regulations and company policies      Collaboration with Other Departments:Work closely with the quality control, production, and engineering teams to identify and address recurring product issues      Provide feedback on warranty-related trends to improve overall product quality      Collaborate with customer service and sales teams to ensure a seamless customer experience      Process Improvement:Continuously assess and enhance warranty processes for efficiency and effectiveness      Propose and implement improvements to prevent future warranty claims      Stay informed about industry best practices and incorporate them into the warranty management system      Training and Education:Conduct training sessions for internal staff and external partners on warranty policies and procedures      Keep team members updated on changes to warranty terms and conditions      Risk Management:Identify potential risks and liabilities associated with warranty claims      Implement measures to mitigate risks and protect the company's interests

column2: Bengaluru Squad Services Pvt Ltd is looking for Field Officers to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey     The Field Officer will be responsible for carrying out various tasks in the field, collecting data, and supporting operational activities     This role requires strong communication skills, attention to detail, and the ability to work independently     The Field Officer will play a crucial role in ensuring the smooth execution of field operations         Key Responsibilities:         Field Operations:Conduct on-site visits to gather data, assess situations, and implement operational plans     Collaborate with internal teams to ensure field activities align with organizational goals     Data Collection and Reporting:Collect and document relevant data during field visits     Prepare accurate and timely reports summarizing field activities and findings     Stakeholder Engagement:Interact with local communities, clients, and stakeholders to build positive relationships     Address concerns and provide information about the organization's initiatives     Compliance and Safety:Ensure compliance with safety protocols and guidelines during field activities     Report any safety issues or incidents promptly     Equipment Management:Maintain and manage equipment used in field operations     Conduct regular checks to ensure proper functionality     Problem Resolution:Identify and address challenges or obstacles encountered during fieldwork     Propose solutions and improvements to enhance operational efficiency

column2: Zylo Micro Care Foundation is looking for Trainee Field Officer to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey      As a Field Officer, you will be responsible for carrying out various field-related tasks and activities to support the organization's operations and objectives      Your role may involve data collection, customer interactions, inspections, assessments, or other field-based tasks, depending on the organization's industry and needs        Key Responsibilities:        Field Operations:Data Collection: Conduct field surveys, interviews, or assessments to gather relevant data and information      Customer Visits: Visit customers, clients, or stakeholders to provide services, collect feedback, or address concerns      Inspections: Perform inspections of facilities, equipment, or properties to ensure compliance with regulations and standards      Reporting:Data Recording: Accurately record and document field data, observations, or findings      Reporting: Prepare and submit reports based on field activities, including data analysis and recommendations      Customer Interaction:Customer Support: Provide information, assistance, or support to customers or clients during field visits      Issue Resolution: Address customer inquiries, complaints, or issues in a timely and effective manner      Compliance:Regulatory Compliance: Ensure compliance with applicable laws, regulations, and company policies during field operations      Quality Control: Conduct quality control checks or assessments as required      Safety and Security:Safety Protocols: Adhere to safety protocols and guidelines while working in the field      Security Measures: Implement security measures to safeguard assets, data, or equipment in the field      Logistics and Inventory:Inventory Management: Manage and maintain inventory or supplies required for field operations      Training and Development:Training: Participate in training programs and workshops to enhance field-related skills and knowledge
